attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248729. **NEW 2022 MODEL**

**REVERSE CAMERA**
**COMFORT MODEL** 
**AUTOMATIC**  
**BLUETOOTH RADIO** 
**MAGIC SEATS**
**ALLOY WHEELS**  
**PERFECT FOR FAMILIES**
**REAR PARK DISTANCE CONTROL**  
**HIEGHT ADJUSTABLE DRIVER SEAT**

**SERVICE PLAN OF 4 YEARS OR 60 000KM** 
**WARRANTY OF 5 YEARS OR 200 000KM** 
**AA ROADSIDE ASSIST – 3 YEARS**

If you’re looking for a practical subcompact SUV, it’s hard to beat the Honda HR-V. Its seats are comfortable and supportive, and you can fold them down, giving the HR-V multiple configurations to suit your needs based on how many people or how much stuff you’re carrying. When both rows are folded, the HR-V has much more cargo room than competitors, making it a good choice if you need to haul things. There are lots of tech features available to keep you connected while on the go.

attributes.description: This vehicle has the balance of the 4 year 120 000 km warranty (whichever comes first) which expires on 30th June/2025 as well as the balance of the 6 year 90 000 km service plan which expires in 30th June /2027. Features include: 10 speed automatic transmission, electronic rear diff lock, remote central locking, electric adjustable side mirrors, leather seats, electric driver’s seat, heated front seats, multi-function steering wheel, tyre pressure monitoring system, lane assist, pre collision assist with pedestrian detection, active park assist with parallel parking, lane departure warning, adaptive cruise control, touch screen radio with cd and usb, ISOFIX, key less entry and start, navigation, bluetooth, rain sensing wipers, auto headlights, LED daytime running lamps, reverse camera, tow bar, drop in bin-liner with 12volt power socket, park distance control sensors front and rear, reverse camera, front fog lamps and side steps. Vehicle is fitted with a body kit & 275/50R20 Rims & Tyres, Tonneau Cover. Trade ins welcome, finance facilities available and deliveries arranged nationwide.
